data.name: The Epic of Inanna
data.detailed_description: An epic story of love, courage, and sacrifice, the tale of Inanna stretches across dozens of cultures and thousands of years. Follow the adventures of four heroes on their journeys of discovery and redemption. A linear visual novel voice-acted by Louise Porter, Richard Browning, Krissy Koellia, and others, The Epic of Inanna is a challenging and thought-provoking exploration of the meaning of life and morality. Available entirely for free with full translation into Arabic, Chinese, Czech, Dutch, English, French, German, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Thai, Turkish, Urdu, and Vietnamese.
data.about_the_game: An epic story of love, courage, and sacrifice, the tale of Inanna stretches across dozens of cultures and thousands of years. Follow the adventures of four heroes on their journeys of discovery and redemption. A linear visual novel voice-acted by Louise Porter, Richard Browning, Krissy Koellia, and others, The Epic of Inanna is a challenging and thought-provoking exploration of the meaning of life and morality. Available entirely for free with full translation into Arabic, Chinese, Czech, Dutch, English, French, German, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Thai, Turkish, Urdu, and Vietnamese.
data.short_description: A linear visual novel voice-acted by Louise Porter, Richard Browning, Krissy Koellia, and others, The Epic of Inanna is a challenging and thought-provoking exploration of the meaning of life and morality.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 2000/7/8/10 and higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 2.6+
  • Processor: x86 or x86-64
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires glibc and x11 are installed

data.legal_notice: Released under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International license.

content_descriptors.notes: This game has adult language, mild partial nudity, and several violent and frightening scenes that are described by the narrator but not shown visually.
